attributes.action: Prostate Checks for Men over 25 on NHS
attributes.additional_details:
Women get smear tests from the age of 25 onwards, and a lot is put into womens health.

More recently there has been some focus on Mens health issue. The Movember movement has brought up issues surrounding mens health.

I believe the next movement is to move to screening program for men over the age of 25, to check for prostate and testicular cancer.

These issues are still hold a stigma for men and they may feel embarressed to go to doctors etc, but we should be given the oppurtunity before it is to late!
